pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64-bit Dual-Core with SSE2 support 2.4GHz+
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.5
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any with proper Windows drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 64-bit Quad-Core with SSE2 Support 3.0GHz+
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan 1.2 with RTX extensions
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any with proper Windows drivers

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: mac OS 12.0
  • Processor: 64-bit Dual-Core with SSE2 support 2.4GHz+ or Apple Silicon (M1)
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable graphics
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any with proper drivers
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: mac OS 12.0
  • Processor: 64-bit Dual-Core with SSE2 support 2.4GHz+ or Apple Silicon (M1)
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable graphics
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any with proper drivers

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or later
  • Processor: 64-bit Dual-Core with SSE2 support 2.4GHz+
  • Memory: 1536 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.5
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any with proper drivers
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu - Latest Version or LTS
  • Processor: 64-bit Quad-Core with SSE2 Support 3.0GHz+
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan 1.2 with RTX extensions
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any with proper drivers

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains low polygonal blood and gore, and enemy dismemberment
